Class AccountController

java.lang.Object
com.c2g4.SingHealthWebApp.Admin.Controllers.AccountController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
@RestController
public class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object

      public AccountController()

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/account/getAllUsers") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllUsers​(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails callerUser)
      only authorized for a manager, returns a list of all users.
      Parameters:
      callerUser - the UserDetails of the caller taken from the Authentication Principal.
      Returns:
      a JsonArray of users with keys {acc_id, first_name, last_name, role_id}, if the callerUser is not a manager, returns HttpStatus UNAUTHORIZED with body "Unauthorized", if any other errors occur along the way, return http BAD_REQUEST

    • getAllUsersofBranch

      @GetMapping("/account/getAllUsersofBranch") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllUsersofBranch​(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails callerUser, @RequestParam java.lang.String branch_id)
      only authorized for a manager, returns a list of all users from a branch
      Parameters:
      callerUser - the UserDetails of the caller taken from the Authentication Principal.
      branch_id - a String of the branch to query from
      Returns:
      a JsonArray of users with keys {acc_id, first_name, last_name, role_id}, if the callerUser is not a manager, returns HttpStatus UNAUTHORIZED with body "Unauthorized", if any other errors occur along the way, return http BAD_REQUEST

    • getAllUsersofType

      @GetMapping("/account/getAllUsersofType") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllUsersofType​(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails callerUser, @RequestParam java.lang.String roleType)
      gets an in depth list of user details of a certain type if the callerUser is authorized, a tenant cannot use this function, auditors can only get tenants from their branch, managers are fully authorized
      Parameters:
      callerUser - the UserDetails of the caller taken from the Authentication Principal.
      roleType - a String either Tenant, Auditor or Manager
      Returns:
      a JsonArray of users with keys {account_id, employee_id, username,first_name,last_name,email,hp,role_id,branch_id}, if roleType == "Tenant" additional keys of {type_id,audit_score,latest_audit,past_audits,store_addr} if roleType == "Auditor" additional keys of {completed_audits, appealed_audits, outstanding_audit_ids,mgr_id} if roleType == "Manager" no additional keys if the callerUser is unauthorized, returns HttpStatus UNAUTHORIZED with body "Unauthorized", if any other errors occur along the way, return http BAD_REQUEST

    • getUserProfile

      @GetMapping("/account/getUserProfile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserProfile​(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails callerUser, @RequestParam(required=false) java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> user_id, @RequestParam(required=false) java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> firstName, @RequestParam(required=false) java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> lastName)
      gets in depth user details of a certain user if the callerUser is authorized, all users can call themselves, a tenant cannot use this function otherwise, auditors can only get tenants from their branch, managers are fully authorized
      Parameters:
      callerUser - the UserDetails of the caller taken from the Authentication Principal.
      user_id - an Optional int of the userId to query, must be present if firstName and lastName is not present
      firstName - an Optional String of the first name to query, must be present is user_id is not present
      lastName - an Optional String of the last name to query, must be present is user_id is not present
      Returns:
      a JsonNode of requested user with keys {account_id, employee_id, username,first_name,last_name,email,hp,role_id,branch_id}, if roleType == "Tenant" additional keys of {type_id,audit_score,latest_audit,past_audits,store_addr} if roleType == "Auditor" additional keys of {completed_audits, appealed_audits, outstanding_audit_ids,mgr_id} if roleType == "Manager" no additional keys if the callerUser is unauthorized, returns HttpStatus UNAUTHORIZED with body "Unauthorized", if any other errors occur along the way, return http BAD_REQUEST

    • postProfileUpdate

      @PostMapping("/account/postProfileUpdate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> postProfileUpdate​(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails callerUser, @RequestPart("changes") java.lang.String changes)
      updates the profile of the callerUser, does not change the password
      Parameters:
      callerUser - the UserDetails of the caller taken from the Authentication Principal.
      changes - a String which is a Json of keys {username, first_name, last_name, email, hp}
      Returns:
      http ok if ok and bad request if bad request

    • postPasswordUpdate

      @PostMapping("/account/postPasswordUpdate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> postPasswordUpdate​(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails callerUser, @RequestPart("new_password") java.lang.String new_password)
      encryptes the new password and updates the database
      Parameters:
      callerUser - the UserDetails of the caller taken from the Authentication Principal.
      new_password - String of the new password
      Returns:
      http ok if ok and bad request if bad request
